about_the_game:
Blackout is a hardcore co-op shooter in which you destroy the mechanical zombies that have infested the Earth Federation. From a secret laboratory no one knows to a high-speed subway station that exists deep underground, Players become near-future special forces and dispatch them to major facilities throughout the federation to wipe out every horde of mechanical zombies.

corpses combined with machines

All zombies in Blackout are combined with different machines. Zombies with grotesque abilities to match their form will always find you and cut you to pieces.

4-player cooperative action

All fields and levels are played alone, and if it is difficult to fight zombies, Squad up with up to 4 other players to crush zombies Blackout is best experienced cooperatively with other players.

Various maps and strategies

In Blackout, players face a variety of fields. Therefore, players equip the firearms of their choice and You have to choose and focus on which strategy to carry out the mission.

name: BLACKOUT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+

short_description: Blackout is a hardcore co-op zombie shooter where you become a future special forces team and must overcome mysterious monsters and living corpses. Experience devastating action and extreme teamwork. It's up to you to complete the mission and eliminate the ruthless monsters without fear of death
